Asthma may worsen the disease course of COVID-19, should infection occur, namely if rescue OCS are prescribed,
18 as was suggested in previous coronavirus outbreaks when systemic steroids were associated with a higher viral load. 19, 20 Clinicians must be aware and recognize the differences between hypoxic respiratory failure and bronchospasm on physical examination to carefully judge the need for a course of OCS.
